directions: Stir together ginger and curry and season with salt and pepper. Pat spice mixture onto flesh sides of salmon. Heat oil in a nonstick skillet over moderate heat until hot but not smoking, then cook salmon, skin sides down, covered, 5 minutes. Turn salmon over and cook, covered, until just cooked through, about 2 minutes more.
Add scallions to skillet with salmon and cook 30 seconds.
ingredients: 2 (6 ounces) pieces center-cut salmon fillet with skin, patted dry
title: Pan-Roasted Salmon with Ginger and Curry
